meanings.definition: Unable to speak, especially due to shock or surprise.
meanings.sent1: She was so speechless when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The little girl stood speechless in awe of the fireworks.
meanings.sent3: His speechless reaction to the magic trick was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset left her speechless.
meanings.sent5: The news of her promotion left her speechless with joy.

meanings.sent1: The silent movie left the audience speechless.

meanings.sent3: The mime artist's performance was truly speechless.
meanings.sent4: The vastness of the ocean made him feel speechless.
meanings.sent5: The serene forest scene left her speechless with wonder.
